title: Lane closures on Severn bridges; NEWS IN BRIEF
body:
BOTH Severn bridges will be hit be lane closures due to maintenance work for the next two nights.

The eastbound M4 on the Prince of Wales Bridge, heading in the direction of Bristol, and westbound M48 on the 
original Severn crossing will be shut from 7pm this evening until 6am tomorrow.

Highway officers are warning motorists to allow extra timefor their journeys as diversions will be set up on both 
routes throughout the works.

Drivers heading into Wales will be directed to the Prince of Wales Bridge, while motorists travelling in the opposite 
direction will have to use the M48.
